K01.title: certification-authority-basis
K01.description: Establishes the certification basis and decision criteria for the Space-T vehicle, defining compliance objectives and mapping them to evidence and verification activities. This knot ensures systematic documentation of how the design meets regulatory requirements across all affected systems.

task_templates.title: define-certification-basis-and-decision-criteria
task_templates.description: Define the certification basis for the Space-T vehicle including applicable regulations (FAA/EASA/ESA), special conditions, equivalent level of safety findings, and certification decision criteria. Document the regulatory framework and authority agreements.
inputs: Applicable regulations (FAA Part 460, EASA CS-SC, ECSS standards)
compliance_refs: FAA Part 460 - Human Space Flight Requirements
EASA CS-SC - Certification Specifications for Space Vehicles
DO-178C - Software Considerations in Airborne Systems
DO-254 - Design Assurance Guidance for Airborne Electronic Hardware

task_templates.title: map-compliance-objectives-to-evidence-and-tests
task_templates.description: Create detailed compliance matrices mapping each certification requirement to specific verification activities, test cases, analyses, and documentation. Establish traceability from requirements through verification to certification evidence.
